rooms.description: North-facing entrance area with open space aligned with Vastu principles.
Spacious living room facing east for positive energy. Connected to the central courtyard.
Traditional Kerala kitchen with open design near the south side of the house.
Separate dining area adjacent to the living room and central courtyard.

openings.description: North-facing main entrance aligned with Vastu principles.
Window opening to the central courtyard for natural light.

notes: The design incorporates traditional Kerala architectural elements such as high ceilings, decorative woodwork, and a central courtyard that acts as the heart of the house.
Vastu principles are adhered to with the north-facing entrance and the positioning of key rooms in optimal directions.
